name: ultimate-video-api
description: A secure, production-grade service to get video download links, with a full UI and admin dashboard.

scripts.build: mkdir -p bin && curl -L https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -o bin/yt-dlp && wget https://johnvansickle.com/ffmpeg/releases/ffmpeg-release-amd64-static.tar.xz -O bin/ffmpeg.tar.xz && tar -xf bin/ffmpeg.tar.xz -C bin/ && mv bin/ffmpeg-*-amd64-static/ffmpeg bin/ffmpeg && rm -rf bin/ffmpeg.tar.xz bin/ffmpeg-*-amd64-static && chmod +x bin/yt-dlp bin/ffmpeg
